about_the_game:
Overview

"Funny Face Apartment" is a single-player first-person stealth horror game. Players must stay alert to residents whose faces transform and attack, while focusing on their tasks. You will experience unpredictable terror and conflict, never knowing who is friend or foe.

Story

You work alone as the sole caretaker of a blood-stained apartment, forced to contend with residents who suddenly become violent. One day, you encounter a mysterious entity that knows the origin of the eerie face-changing phenomenon. Contact with this shocking truth hidden in the apartment sets you on a journey to end your insane daily life.

Gameplay

Residents wander around the map, and you must complete tasks among them. Without weapons, players must choose whether to flee, hide, or bypass approaching individuals. It's difficult to determine who is insane. Keep an eye out for signs of facial transformation. Completing tasks unfolds the story.
